title: Can you Game On The Cheapest Microsoft Surface Tab?
description: I try gaming on the cheapest Microsoft Surface Tab and it went better than expected.  Thank you Micro Center for sending me the Surface Go and Pen. New customers can receive a FREE 256GB SSD, no purchase necessary, in store only, new customer exclusive.   Links (non-affiliate): Microsoft Surface Go 3 10.5 2-in-1 Laptop  Platinum:  and the Microsoft Surface Pen M1776 SC Platinum:    Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on by 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:  Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
